title: Companies Get Creative in Hunt for AI Talent
sub_head: Businesses are sponsoring AI award programs, holding ‘datathons’ and scouting software development contests
body:
Surging demand for artificial-intelligence talent is pushing businesses to get more creative in their recruitment efforts.
Companies are sponsoring AI award programs at universities, holding “datathons” and scouting software development contests, among other initiatives, as they compete for data scientists, machine-learning developers and other AI professionals.
